text:
@JBellamyTV Death-count 4/21/20 in countries that took prompt, aggressive action:

S. Korea: 237
Japan: 263
Hong Kong: 4
Taiwan: 6
NZ 13

The US where #Trump called COVID-19 a hoax & ignored it for 70 days, faces huge deficit of ventilators/masks/PPEs:
US Death Toll From COVID-19 Tops 42,518
